citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
14-Jun-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house. Inspector then called telephone numbers given by
the licensee. Per telephone conservation, the licensee stated that they had a prior scheduled commitment and
would not be available to come home in 30 minutes to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
14-Jun-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house.  Inspector then called telephone numbers given by
the licensee.  Per telephone conservation, the licensee stated that they had a prior scheduled commitment and
would not be available to come home in 30 minutes to do a facility inspection.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
